name: Broken Windows
description:
Made during Game-Jam-192, the theme was When we were young

This short experience takes users on a small trip down memory lane, to a simpler time.

All art assets were recreated during the jam, with the exception of  the faces of a pack of cards, sourced from Kenney's assets (the backsides were recreated for the jam).

All sounds used   are Royalty free assets.

192 hours was not enough to  make the game I wanted, so this prototype is merely an indication of... what might have been. Thanks for playing!
